title: President Donald J. Trump Is Unleashing Innovation for American Farmers – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Land & Agriculture	

Issued on:
June 11, 2019
Our Nation will always be proud of the unmatched grit and faith and skill of the American farmer.
						President Donald J. Trump					GROWING INNOVATION IN THE HEARTLAND: President Donald J. Trump is working to streamline the regulatory maze for agricultural biotechnology. HELPING FARMERS FUEL AMERICA: President Trump has delivered on his promise to open up E15 sales year-round, providing a boost to America’s corn growers. ALLY TO AGRICULTURE: President Trump has been an ally and friend to America’s farmers.
